definition: Feature date t (information up to end of day t).
Asset identifier (stock symbol).
Log return on date t: log(P_t) - log(P_{t-1}).
Next-day log return to predict: log(P_{t+1}) - log(P_t).
Date corresponding to target_ret (t+1).
SPY market log return at t-1.
VIX level (close) at t-1.
VIX log return at t-1.
Effective Fed Funds Rate at t-1 (forward-filled to trading days).
10-year Treasury yield at t-1 (forward-filled).
S&P500 index level at t-1 (from FRED, forward-filled).
Log return of FRED SP500 level at t-1.
Daily change in DFF at t-1.
Daily change in DGS10 at t-1.
Stock return at t-1.
Stock return at t-2.
Stock return at t-3.
Stock return at t-5.
Stock return at t-10.
Rolling std of returns over last 5 days ending at t.
Rolling std of returns over last 10 days ending at t.
Rolling std of returns over last 20 days ending at t.
Train/val/test split label based on target_date.
